title: Maestro Error
body:
I'm trying to log into League of Legends, but I get a message saying: There was an error connecting with Maestro. League of Legends will now exit. Please try restarting the client.

I restarted the client and nothing happened. I even restarted my computer and still nothing happened. 

Anyone else having this problem or is it just me?

Someone please help. :(

replies.body: Maestro errors are usually due to a an issue with your network being unable to hold a steady connection to the servers.  It looks like the connection issues guide that Rineyy provided fixed this up.  Glad to hear all is well now!

Maestro errors usually stem from a failure to establish a stable connection to the servers.

[Troubleshoot your connectivity issues.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)
